Wiri:
Have you heard of this place? It hasn't been long since I began exploring, but I'll give you some useful information. Monsters have made this place their abode, despite the stirring cyclones.
Ah, and this place was recently discovered, so there isn't much information about it. But I've heard the King of Spirits, who has the Energy of Wind, also dwells here. If your curiosity about this peculiar place is stirred, then allow me to tell you more.
